title: Baise Shandian
synopsis:
After a crushing defeat in a major tournament, Zhang Ruoyi, forced to abandon her professional career, returned to school. In the unfamiliar environment, table tennis, which had once cast a shadow over her, became a ray of light piercing through her confusion—on the table, she made teammates; off the court, she gained friendships. This time, the young woman decided to give it her all and swing her racket towards the future.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
